explanation: Sentiment among participants is skewed towards a near-term drop in BTC, citing repeated references to resistance at 108k-109k, anticipation of a dump on Friday due to contract expiry, and general weakness at the top of the descending channel. While a few mention considering long positions if support holds, the dominant view is caution or shorting, especially around 107700-108000. No strong bullish catalyst or consensus for immediate upside. Notably, several traders discuss shorting at 108k and expecting further downside, but there is some hesitance and calls for tight stop losses, reflecting only medium confidence.
